MRKB.StyledHotbarHint: Applies a 2-row hotbar and access to other rows via the Shift key.
MRKB.StyledPauseScreenHint: Improves the style of the pause screen.
MRKB.StyledPlayersHint: Improves the style of the players list and inserts avatars and character portraits.
MRKB.StyledSceneControlsAndSidebarMenuName: Styled Scene Controls and Sidebar Menu
MRKB.StyledSceneControlsAndSidebarMenuHint: Improves the style of scene controls and sidebar menu.
MRKB.StyledSceneNavigationHint: Improves the style of scene navigation.
MRKB.StyledChatListBackgroundHint: Inserts a background into the chat list.
